heroContent.title: üè∏ Activity Provider
heroContent.description: We are a proud PlayOn Registered Activity Provider, delivering safe, structured, and inclusive sporting programs. Brisbane Badminton is also a Blue Card Verified organisation, ensuring child safety and community trust. We are affiliated with the Queensland Badminton Association and aligned with Badminton Australia standards.

points: üè∏ Kids Academy: Fun, engaging sessions that build strong fundamentals.
üí™ Adult Group Training: Skill-based classes to help you improve fast.
ü§ù Social & Team Play: Train in a friendly group environment and enjoy the game.

academyContent.title: üéØ Personal Training

points: üéì One-on-One Coaching: Fully customised training for your goals.
üèÖ Elite Development: Preparing athletes for state & national competition.

programs.title: Kids‚Äô Group Training
programs.description: Structured junior programs (Mini Smashers 6‚Äì10, Junior Squad 11‚Äì15, Teen Squad 15+).

programs.title: Adult Group Training
programs.description: Beginner and intermediate classes designed to build skills, fitness, and game understanding in a social setting.

programs.title: Private Coaching
programs.description: One-on-one training tailored to individual goals, available in flexible packages.- Advanced Training & Development: High-performance group sessions preparing athletes for state, national, and international competition

programs.title: Tournament Prep
programs.description: Specialized coaching for players preparing for tournaments. Mental preparation, strategy, and match simulation.

coaches.description: All coaches are qualified, accredited, and active players, bringing both technical expertise and on-court experience to every session.

trainingPlan: Week 1 - Week 4: Basic skills, special fitness, physical fitness, game rules, game play
Week 6 - Week 7: Training Development & Player Assessment
Week 8 - Week 9: Game knowledge & Match development, Competition preparation
Week 10: Internal Academy Competition 20/09 Saturday & 21/09 Sunday
info.kidsFees: Term Training Fee: $375/term/student/lesson/week | Casual/Trial lesson Fee: $50/session (2 Hrs.)/student
info.adultFees: Term Training Fee: $375/term/student/lesson/week | Casual/Trial lesson Fee: $50/session (2 Hrs.)/student
notices: Term fee $375 is only applicable for the students enrolling 10 weeks program (within their enrolled day) which is non-refundable or redeemable to any other forms of service
Students enrolling other than Term Training is considered as CASUAL enrollment with $50/lesson/student
All the makeup lesson must be completed within the enrolled term
A make-up lesson must be scheduled within the enrolled term and must be requested within AT LEAST 24 hours of notice.
A student is allowed to schedule up to 3 make-up lessons over term training.
Brisbane Badminton may request a medical certificate if a student is sick on a training day and requests a make-up lesson within LESS THAN 24 hours of notice.
Student should bring their own Badminton Racquet, Sport Shoe (no black sole), Water/Drink bottle.
Training arrangements are made accordingly if any events are hosted in the facility.
Further notices will be informed and discussed in the WhatsApp group/E-mail or DM Parent/Student.

info.title: Personal Training
info.description: Get personalized coaching to improve your skills and performance. Our expert coaches will work with you one-on-one to develop a training plan tailored to your needs.
